description:
Your journey around the world continues with more pages to color in. The DLC offers 18 new illustrations, taking you back in time. Use your imagination and brighten dinosaurs, Aztecs, and exciting costumes with colors.

Iron your flannel and prepare your painting brush! Get ready for an incredible ride around the world in Coloring Pages: Lumberhill Tales. You decide the colors of each scene with a wide variety of colors, textures, brushes, and stamps.
name: Heroes and Dinosaurs DLC
